newsitem.title: USA: DAOU files for share offering.
newsitem.headline: DAOU files for share offering.

text.p: DAOU Systems Inc said late Tuesday it has filed a registration statement for a proposed public offering of 2 million shares of common stock.
The company said in a statement 500,000 shares will be sold by the company with the balance sold by certain selling stockholders.

Hambrecht & Quist will lead manage the underwriting group with Alex Brown & Sons Inc and Cowen & Co as co-managers. The company and the selling stockholders have granted the underwriters an over-allotment option of 300,000 shares.
